caption: Went here mid week in early October. Great time to catch the leaves being yellow and brown. Very relaxed vibe and has New York Central Park feeling to the place. Lots of seating options and really seems like a central hub for people to gather. Lots of joggers, spotted some yoga classes to. The statues are amazing a nd the water fountains are a must see.
Sad to see that this little unique experience is closed now ! The park is pitching for a new supplier and it doesn’t seem to have been finalized yet. Many Paris books for kids to be updated! A shame
Very pretty, many chairs to sit in, which can be arranged in whichever way preferred.  Toilets: you can go to the cafe, but its 1 euro per toiletvisit.
Perfect stop to relax and people watch, especially if you have kids as the toy sailboats are a hit!
Fabulous entertainment for kids. Rent a sailing boat with the flag/country of your choosing and set sail over the pond. The historical backdrop makes for great pictures.
Beautiful garden park with a nice relaxed atmosphere
One of the nicer places in Paris. Read a book by the fountain, as the kids sail boats and run around.
so pretty and amazing, great view really one of my favourite things I went to see in Paris, I will go back to this! <3
Loved paying with the sailboats with my son
A water fountain in the Luxembourg Gardens, where small sailboats are sailed. You can buy the boat and place it in the fountain’s pond.
nice
You could get cute little boats and play with them in the fountain. How cool is that?
Great park for a break with cool gust and green shade.
Cute, fun for kids and sailors. Bring your own remote control boat and crush the competition.
If you want to spend time with your kids and rent a toy sailboat this is the place
Loved especially those little boats on the pond.
Nice and relaxing park. Deserves a visit.
Lovely thing.
Ggg
Lovely

A beautiful park with lots of benches and deckchairs for resting. It's a shame that the children's playground is for a fee. Children over 2 pay €3, accompanying person €1 You can pay for a ride on ponies.
Here we go from Pont Neuf to Luxemburg Garten

The park is very beautiful, there are fewer tourists here than, for example, in the Tuileries Gardens. Everyone will find a place to sit, enjoy the silence and a gorgeous view. Beautiful sculptures. Many people wrote in their reviews that children find it very interesting here. My son was indifferent to this park. The ships are of interest for the first 3 minutes. Then, it becomes boring.
Nice park. Sailboats can be launched on the small pond. Toy sailboats.😂 …
Extensive gardens, well maintained, there are chairs to sit and relax, Too much dust, Mini sailboat rental 6 euros 30 minutes. Ideal for children
Pretty pond with sailboats and carp easily observed!
great body of water in the garden facing the Senate...lots of people so sunny!

No electronic chips or lithium batteries... Only colorful sails which slip silently over the surface of the pool with the wind and which make children dream. It is not nostalgia but the wisdom of a simple and soothing pleasure. My 7 year old son really enjoyed it and so did I (who is 45)! A beautiful moment.
A very great experience, the whole lake is full of messengers. Very nice here!
Great little boats that attract young and old
I want to stay in this place for a long time)
My dream as a child….
My God!! What a beautiful place!! at least when we went, it was very nice for a picnic or just to chill out…
Going there with your family and children is an unforgettable experience!
Young and old have a good time sharing simply. A timeless classic. Price of €6 for 30 min (August 2022).
Nice place to rest and relax. Very big and quiet.
One of the most beautiful parks in Paris, if not the world…
Good, but preferably a day with a little, moderate or a little more wind
